transcript: one of the most common things you see in internet marketing is the secrets the rich don't want you to know from everybody that I know who's wealthy they shout from the rooftops all the things they did to actually become wealthy it's just that poor people don't want to listen just don't believe that false narrative you become Wealthy by providing value to other people and so even the idea that the rich people have some secret that you don't know if you believe that it's what is keeping you poor
